item.title: By: Taylor Steil
item.dc:creator: Taylor Steil
item.description: Dude, great write up. I was doing much of this work (resorting/reshuffling my data) myself, I didn't even realize protovis has built in methods to do it. Thanks for the post!
item.content:encoded: Dude, great write up. I was doing much of this work (resorting/reshuffling my data) myself, I didn’t even realize protovis has built in methods to do it. Thanks for the post!

item.title: By: Jerome Cukier » Working with data in protovis – part 3 of 5
item.dc:creator: Jerome Cukier » Working with data in protovis – part 3 of 5
item.description: [...] So, with the use of simple array functions, I can easily rework an unprepared dataset in protovis, rather than having to tailor my dataset with manual (and error-prone) manipulations in external programs. Here is the result: Next: reshaping complex arrays [...]
item.content:encoded: […] So, with the use of simple array functions, I can easily rework an unprepared dataset in protovis, rather than having to tailor my dataset with manual (and error-prone) manipulations in external programs. Here is the result: Next: reshaping complex arrays […]
